title: Strengthening Language Competencies Through Dialogic Argumentation and Interdisciplinary Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Argumentative Structures and Foundational Knowledge in Interdisciplinary Topics
context.additional_context: Students engage in blended learning (online/offline) using personal devices and acquire practical argumentation skills through interdisciplinary projects in language, philosophy, and science

learning_goals: Students can analyze argument structures from multidisciplinary perspectives and develop critical thinking through dialogic discussions
Enhance collaborative problem-solving skills for complex issues through interdisciplinary project implementation
Document argumentation processes using digital tools and generate formative assessment materials incorporating feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
